thread.section_title: Avalon Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Hotel was ok
thread.title_full: Hotel was ok - Review of Avalon Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Mrbowtie26
title: Hotel was ok
text: Hotel was fairly nice but rooms were 80 degrees. They apologized saying the hotel was old and the AC couldn't be turned on. They brought me a fan even with the windows open and it being 55 degrees out the room wouldn't get below 77. Then we got hit with an extra $40 in fees per night because of my daughter (even though I put 3 people when I reserved room), and some facility fee of 20 per night. Those fees made the "deal" we got not a good deal at all. I will never stay at this hotel again, and will probably never use TripAdvisor again.
